docs.title: English-Japanese Technical Lexicon
docs.text:
Welcome to this lexicon for technical vocabulary. Use the search feature above or filter through the topics

Note

This lexicon is in active development! You can contribute to this lexicon through the Github repository

docs.title: Acknowledgements
docs.text: This project is inspired by the EN-JP-ML-Lexicon github project. While most of the translations are taken from the translation of Stanford's CS229 and CS230. Here, we only aim to provide a more user-friendly platform to retrieve information while contributing to the corpus with new translations.

docs.title: Tags
docs.text: Following is a list of relevant tags:

docs.title: Concave - 凹
docs.text:
graph LR
  A((=)) --> B([Concave]);
  A --> C([凹]);
  C --> D([おう]);
  C --> E([ou]);

Warning

May be confused with: - Convex - 凸

docs.title: Training  - 研修
docs.text:
graph LR
  A((=)) --> B((Training));
  A --> C([研修]);
  C --> D([けんしゅう]);
  C --> E([kenshuu]);

Warning

May be confused with - Learning - 学習　(More focus on learning)

研修 in this sense relates more to courses/in-job training. ML : When training a model in machine learning, the usual translation would be Learning - 学習
